snippet.title: Kaido Battle 3 Intro 4K Remastered (Tokyo Xtreme Racer Drift 2)
snippet.description:
NEW ! PATREON AND DISCORD SERVER ON DESCRIPTION ! 

Here is the original intro of kaido battle 3/Kaido Racer 2/tokyo xtreme racer drift 2.

I use the original intro quality and upscale it into 4K using AI upscaler and adobe after effect.
The original video had a resolution of 640x440 at 29,97fps.

i upscale it into 4K resolution at 30fps.

I didn't use 60fps because it's useless when the source is 30fps and can produce glitch, i prefer to kept the original quality as much as possible.


It was tons of work but in the end i'm happy with the results.

There will be other video in the future, if there is any request don't hesitate to ask me.


I had recently made a Patreon for anyone who want to support my work, it's will grant access to some stuff !

https://www.patreon.com/WhiteCharisma


Want to talk about amazing game or opening/ending, want to had a request ? join my discord server !


https://discord.gg/RQ66jma

Thanks !
